avalancheActivity.highlights: Little or no snow in the forecasting area. NW storm and some snowshowers on Fridy but unlikely that enough snow will accumulate to create avalanche danger

snowpackStructure.highlights: Little or no snow in the forecasting area. NW storm and some snowshowers on Fridy but unlikely that enough snow will accumulate to create avalanche danger

travelAdvisory.comment: The night before Friday it starts to snow in stiff SW wind in the west part of Iceland. Turns to stiff NW wind and snow blizzard on Friday morning, moves east later in the day. NW blizzard in N- and E- parts of Iceland on Friday afternoon, turns to lighter N wind on Satureday and showers of snow. Windslabs are expected to form in all ascpets in the west but mainly in southerly aspects in the North and east. Windslabs are expected to be unstalbe for some time after the weather calms.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Considerable new snow accumulates in the north part of Iceland on Friday and Saturday and snow will likely be unstable at first.

weatherForecast.highlights: Suðlægar áttir og rigning en snýst í norðvestan storm á föstudag með éljum. Norðanátt, kalt og úrkomulítið á laugardag

avalancheActivity.highlights: NW blizzard on Friday. N-NE snowstorm on Saturday. Little snow prior to this upcoming weather, but avalanche danger is expected to increase.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Little snow is forecasted in the area following warm weather. A considerable amount of snow could accumulate in gullies and on the lee side of mountains on Friday and over the next weekend

travelAdvisory.comment: The night before Friday it starts to snow in stiff SW wind in the west part of Iceland. Turns to stiff NW wind and snow blizzard on Friday morning, moves east later in the day. NW blizzard in N- and E- parts of Iceland on Friday afternoon, turns to lighter N wind on Satureday and showers of snow. Windslabs are expected to form in all ascpets in the west but mainly in southerly aspects in the North and east. Windslabs are expected to be unstalbe for some time after the weather calms.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Considerable new snow accumulates in the north part of Iceland on Friday and Saturday and snow will likely be unstable at first.

weatherForecast.highlights: Suðlægar áttir og rigning en snýst í norðvestan storm með talsverði snjókomu og skafrenningi á Föstudag. Hvöss N-NA átt með snjókomu og skfrenningi á laugardag.

avalancheActivity.highlights: NW blizzard is expected for Friday, with wind becoming more northerly on Saturday, accompanied by considerable snowfall. Wind slabs will form on southerly aspects. Some old snow persists at high altitudes. Avalanche activity is expected during the later part of the forecast period.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Considerable new snow is expected on Friday and Saturday in stiff NW and N winds. Wind slabs will form on southerly aspects. Old snow persists in high mountains, and the bond between the old and new snow will be uncertain. Some avalanche activity is expected as new snow accumulates.

travelAdvisory.comment: The night before Friday it starts to snow in stiff SW wind in the west part of Iceland. Turns to stiff NW wind and snow blizzard on Friday morning, moves east later in the day. NW blizzard in N- and E- parts of Iceland on Friday afternoon, turns to lighter N wind on Satureday and showers of snow. Windslabs are expected to form in all ascpets in the west but mainly in southerly aspects in the North and east. Windslabs are expected to be unstalbe for some time after the weather calms.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Considerable new snow accumulates in the north part of Iceland on Friday and Saturday and snow will likely be unstable at first.

weatherForecast.highlights: Fremur hvöss SV-átt á fimmtudag og rigning en kólnar hratt um kvöldið og fer að élja til fjalla. Á föstudag snýr í hvassa NV-átt með talsverðri eða mikilli snjókomu í öllum hæðum. Á laugardag verður vindur norðlægari með áframhaldandi snjókomu.

avalancheActivity.highlights: It starts to snow on Friday and Saturday with stiff NW-wind. Snow will accumulate in S and SE aspects. Avalanche activity is possible in the later part of the forecasting time.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Occasional old snow patches in high elevations but new snow expected on Friday afternoon and Saturday in stiff NW wind at first. Windslabs will form in southerly aspects, that are likely unstable at first.

travelAdvisory.comment: The night before Friday it starts to snow in stiff SW wind in the west part of Iceland. Turns to stiff NW wind and snow blizzard on Friday morning, moves east later in the day. NW blizzard in N- and E- parts of Iceland on Friday afternoon, turns to lighter N wind on Satureday and showers of snow. Windslabs are expected to form in all ascpets in the west but mainly in southerly aspects in the North and east. Windslabs are expected to be unstalbe for some time after the weather calms.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Considerable new snow accumulates in the north part of Iceland on Friday and Saturday and snow will likely be unstable at first.

weatherForecast.highlights: Þurrt að kalla fram á föstudags eftirmiðdegi, fer þá að snjóa í hvassri NV átt en vindur verður norðlægari á laugardag með áframhaldandi snjókomu.
